channel.description: Recent content in tutorial jhipster on

item.title: Introdução ao jhipster
item.description: Instalação do JHipster no Windows # Instale o Java 8 do site da Oracle. (Opcional) Instale uma ferramenta de construção Java. Whether you choose to use Maven or Gradle, you normally don’t have to install anything, as JHipster will automatically install the Maven Wrapper or the Gradle Wrapper for you. If you don’t want to use those wrappers, go to the official Maven website or Gradle website to do your own installation.
